entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Slave Lake

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers before morning with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Local smoke. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Local smoke. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
